## OneSpanSign.createPackage() method

Creates a package (transaction).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createPackage(payload: CreatePackageRequestPayload): Promise<CreatePackageResponsePayload>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payload | [CreatePackageRequestPayload](./onespan-sign-node.createpackagerequestpayload.md) | Package initial information |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[CreatePackageResponsePayload](./onespan-sign-node.createpackageresponsepayload.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A payload that contains the ID of the newly created package
